message.raw: Fixed a bug with analogue acquisition in BLACS, and fixed a bug with reporting an error in PyDAQmx, and fixed some bugs with programming the novatech. Commented out some incomplete work in the andor ixon hardware interface file, since it breaks BLACS in its current state. Shaun will fix soon.
